author: Bobby Watson
comment: My favorite looking watch face, my only problem is with the recent Android 2.0 update. Previously status indicators (dnd, disconnection, charging) appeared near the middle of the face, now they are appearing at the top of the screen, which is making it difficult to tell when my watch is disconnected or in DND mode. Is there any way to fix this?

author: Steve Parrish
comment: I love the look of this face, but the battery drain is horrible. My battery is dead after 8 hrs with only this face...16 hours otherwise. Even if I disable everything and go to the lowest screen brightness, it buys me another hour. Its a shame because I really want to use it otherwise.

author: Wissam M. Khoury
comment: Very nice and elegant but after AW2 it's becoming very old and not useful. The developer doesn't answer or make any effort to improve it. Only complications works as icons and you cannot actually go to the application from it. No widgets as well. It is a shame as this is one of the best designed watchface. Hope the developer will start listening to the feedback.

author: Ryan Henrie
comment: Overall, one of my favorite watch faces.  I love the day and dual battery dials, but the weather dial is useless.  It's always wrong.  It will be raining, and it will say it's clear, or vice-versa, as if the location is wrong. Fix the weather, and 5 stars.  Also, I wish there was an option to put voicemail and unread sms message count in one of the circles.

author: Brendan O'Connor
comment: The weather is no longer working for me. It is one of the major reasons I have the watch face. It now shows it as 70 degrees Fahrenheit and raining no matter the weather and location. Any way to fix this?

author: OMaR Al-Jumaiah
comment: I love this watch face , One of the best. The only problem I have is that When I choose third party complication such as google fit or AccuWeather , Nothing appears in the watch face , total blank .   Also , I will appreciate it if you can add option for digital time as a complication or as a replacement for the classic clock.   Thank you for this great watch face.

author: Mark Hawkins
comment: Doesn't display aviation logo, name, or custom name. Notice watch battery depleting quickly since installing but still a very nice watch face with good customizations. Very happy with despite slight downsides. Highly recommend.

author: Brad Gronek
comment: Great watch face.  The one thing I would add is interactivity to the built in complications.  Tapping the weather complication should open my favourite weather app, date should open my agenda, battery should open energy options, etc.

author: Mody Nakhla
comment: Complications do not work properly. Top complication doesn't show up and always empty. Would not recommend this watch face.

author: Franjo Dobrun
comment: Zenwatch 2 wear 2.0   great looking watch face! third party complications dont work, also ambient settings dont work as they should.

author: makesh j
comment: The watch face looks really posh but the "3rd party app" complications don't work. Otherwise the watch face makes my watch look much more expensive than it actually is, and makes it really easy to read time and other displayed info.

author: Tim Stradling
comment: Need a refund please. Does not work on my Huawei. App loaded on my Pixel. Let me adjust settings. Says it's on my watch. But not. Can't contact the developer for a refund. Link in Google Play to contact goes in a loop on my play receipt.

author: troy laplante
comment: Really like it and it was worth the money. But the third party complication will not show on watch face. Tried a few none worked. Wanted steps to show.

author: Will Zoueihed
comment: Good looking watchface but with horrible battery drain. Decreased battery life by over 50%. Do not spend the money

author: Rey Muñoz
comment: When I first installed it it was working fine now logo is showing already disabled the logo option and it still shows I'm using this app on moto 360 2nd gen with my LG v20 can you please fix?

author: Mark Ghattas
comment: 3rd party apps stopped appearing on complications.  This is reason I purchased.  How do I get developer support?

author: Myles Heckaman
comment: This is the second face I've purchased. This one is even better than the last. Would live to be able to drop an f-bomb to relay my satisfaction. That's how effing cool this thing looks!

author: Benedict Koh
comment: I just bought it after the latest update on my LG Urbane 2 but it does not show up in the watch faces like the others.. can I get a refund ?

author: Werner Beroux
comment: The next calendar event didn't work but other complications work well and I like the style.

author: Yasir Abdulrasheed
comment: Third party complications does not work on my Huawei watch 2 ,they should work on complications

author: Bradford Singleton
comment: This is a stylish and functional watchface I have used on my two Zen watches and Now my V24. I would rate it among the most stable in terms of battery consuming while at same time being great to look at.

author: James Soutouras
comment: Great watch face on Huawei. One of my favorites! Now with Android 2 complications!

author: Timothy Miller
comment: Love the look and ability to customize, but the ability to set a city for weather is very limited and doesn't even include some state capitals. Automatic location may work, but I don't leave GPS on on my phone.

author: Chris Harrington
comment: 3rd part complications do not work. They just show a blank space.

author: Nico Hi
comment: Good look BUT very heavy battery usage!! My watch battery is about 4 hours earlier empty!!!

author: Adrian Burns
comment: This developer, imo, makes some of the best looking watch faces out there. Have a few already and will definitely be adding more.

author: Alex Wang
comment: The background is not pure black. It's some sort of gray
The weather forecast is always wrong...This would be a 5 star app if the developer would take the time to fix the weather feature.

author: Konstantin M
comment: What happened to the steps complication? Gone all of a sudden.

author: P Soetaki Lim
comment: One of my favourite watch faces. Could have got 5 stars however last version could not make logo invisible when I toggled it on and off.

author: Richard Smith
comment: Looks sharp and has everything one needs oh their wrist.  Well I got a new phone and can't get watch face on my watch now

author: Jeff Jaret
comment: Horrible battery life on my Fossil Gen 3 wactch

author: Dave South
comment: Great looking face but as others have said the battery drain is awful. Any from 40hrs to 18hrs using this face.

author: Andy Geoghegan
comment: Seems to have stopped working. LG Watch Sport

author: Robert Crutchington
comment: Please would you consider doing a Tizen compatible version? The Gear S3 has nothing like this; you'd clean up!

author: Nathanael Rouillard
comment: Very nice design, but sadly does not seem to work with third party complications.

author: SP Chiu
comment: Have used a couple of android watches now, and find after time I keep coming back to this face. Looks polished and classy.

author: Jamie Kettlewell
comment: Still my favourite watch race but.... Still needs more work with android wear 2.0 🙁

author: nary HZD
comment: sir! i bought it installed it but never showed on wear !!

author: Alpro C.
comment: Not syncing with Android Wear on Android 7.1.2 (LG Urbane)
